title: SILPAKORN INTERNATIONAL MUSIC FESTIVAL AND CONFERENCE 2024
description: 8 June 2024 13:00    Keynote: Discovering Non-formal Learning Experience in Classical Court Dance and Music at the Arts Space of Yogyakarta, Indonesia by Professor Madya Dr. Muhammad Fazil Taib Bin Saerani, Universiti Pendidikan Sultan Iris (Malaysia) 13:45    Keynote: "Wandering cheerfull into a better land?" East-West Opportunities for a Global Musicology by Dr. Monika Hennemann, Cardiff University (UK) Other Activities – Academic Presentations and Performances between 10:20 – 20:00 – Discussions on Classical Music, Jazz Music, Music Education, and more – In Multi-function Room (1st floor), 401, 501, and Auditorium (5th floor) – Register: https://www.ticketmelon.com/silpakornmusic/simfest24 (https://www.ticketmelon.com/silpakornmusic/simfest24) 7-9 June: Silpakorn International Music Festival (SIMFest) Key Events – 7 June 2024, 19:00         Feroci Philharmonic Winds with Low Chee Meng – 8 June 2024, 18.30         Piano Recital by Kenneth Hamilton – 9 June 2024, 16:00         Silapkorn Jazz All-Star Collective & Student Jazz Ensemble – 9 June 2024, 17:30         The Jeremy Monteiro Qaurtet ft. Alemay Fernandez – 9 June 2024, 19:00         Banglumpoo Blues Company -Ticket: https://www.ticketmelon.com/silpakornmusic/simfest24 (https://www.ticketmelon.com/silpakornmusic/simfest24) สอบถามรายละเอียดเพิ่มเติมได้ที่ อ.ดร.ภูมิภักดิ์ จารุประกร โทร. 089-797-6425 Facebook: คณะดุริยางคศาสตร์ มหาวิทยาลัยศิลปากร (https://www.facebook.com/silpakornmusic)
location: BACC สถานที่ห้องอเนกประสงค์ ชั้น 1, ห้องออดิทอเรียม ชั้น 5
